introduction: To increase customer engagement, Codetta Tech should focus on interacting with high-value customers, customize products and marketing messages, and target customers based on their needs and preferences.

action_points.title: Interact with High-Value Customers
action_points.description: Spend the bulk of resources interacting with high-value customers who have the potential for growth and profitability.

action_points.title: Customize Products and Marketing Messages
action_points.description: Tailor products and marketing messages to meet the specific needs and preferences of customers to provide them with exactly what they want.

action_points.title: Target Customers Based on Needs
action_points.description: Identify and target customers based on their buying patterns, likes, dislikes, and future spending potential to offer them personalized experiences.
